item.title: The Real Mistake That Needs To Be Fixed
item.description: Mistakes…Why am I talking about them? The answer is - Kotlin documentation. To be more precise, me stumbling into Tony Hoare being referenced in the Kotlin documentation for the development of Null reference. Later I found the same reference in an article about error handling. When I googled it, I found many more places that mentioned so-called “billion-dollar mistake”: articles, pictures of the mountains with a quote (as if it is supposed to be an inspiration), even conference talk.

item.title: Tips for more effective public speaking
item.description: Effective public speaking is a crucial to your personal, professional and social success. At the same time many developers luck the confidence to communicate clearly, which leads to missing out on career opportunities. The biggest threat to our confidence is anxiety, in other words - being nervous. Anxiety - is a signal that we are doing something important. So you can not get rid of it completely. But we do not want anxiety to prevent us from being ourselves and let our skills shine.

item.title: Team framework
item.description: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants. Isaac Newton Programming is not about coding it is about working with people. Sounds easy, isn’t it? You put people in one room, and somehow it all should magically work out. The problem is that most people do not even come across as they intend to. I am not even talking about solving complex issues.
